name: Fashion AR - Style Made Real
description:
Become the best fashion stylist! Dress up and style outfits, take photos of your models in the studio or in real world locations in AR.

Win Stylish and exclusive clothing collections & accessories, with 1000's of items available to choose from, and new clothing collections added regularly!

With a diverse choice of models from around the world, each with their own unique style and personality. Who will you pick?

Live the life of a fashion model.
Travel the world visiting amazing locations taking part in stunning photoshoots.

See your model brought to life in the real world with AR!
Take pictures of models just like you would with your friends using augmented reality.
________________________________________
Contact Support:
support@fortunefish.co.uk
__________________________________________
Payments FAQ:

Does Fashion AR allow in-app payments?

- Fashion AR is a free-to-play app, like many apps, there is the option of purchasing in-app items using real money. Turn off in-app purchases on your device if you’d like to disable this feature.

Privacy Policy: https://www.fashionar.com/privacy
Terms of Use: https://www.fashionar.com/terms
Community Guidelines: https://www.fashionar.com/community-guidelines
__________________________________________
Notes:
- Requires iOS 13.0+
- Compatible with iPhone 6s or newer.
- Compatible with iPads: Mini 4, Air 2, Pro 1st Gen & iPad 5th Gen or newer iPads then listed here.
- Compatibility information may be changed at any time.
- Please ensure you have enough free space available on your device before installing.
- Information current as of: March 3rd, 2022.
- This game requires an internet connection (WiFi or 4G) to play.
